observer.name: Trialist Analysis Streams
observer.description: The Trialist analysis streams are described by two schemas. One schema defines a normalized list of ohmage self-report data points and the other defines a list of objects pertaining to post-trial analysis for six patient outcomes.

stream.name: Trialist Data Points
stream.description: A list of self-report data points with metadata for providing context to the list.

stream.name: Trialist Analysis Results
stream.description: Contains a map of outcomes to analysis results for each.
